definition.text: Remember the Crypto Ecosystem hierarchy? We made a quick stop here before starting data mining!

paragraphs.text: This is where you configure which exchanges and markets you work with, and also your accounts with those exchanges, your API keys, your assets, and so on.
Why don't you take a little walk and I'll catch up with you in the next step?
Just look around... enjoy the views! I know your first visit to this hierarchy was a bit abrupt!
